column5: Am interested in fishing Reindeer Lake, Trout Camp in particular. Has anyone made this trip up there and has anyone stayed at trout camp. Also what time of the year did you go. Any info is greatly appreciated in advanceBig K

i was there about 10 years ago in june. probably too long to be of any help. i am quite sure they have changed owners since then. at that time it was well run. very enjoyable for pike and macs. not much walleye action. apparently the eyes really migrate and they kept telling us "they aren't down yet". i have a 28# pike on my wall from that trip.
